DBusWatch * m_cobj
 

Detailed Description

Provides file descriptor watches.

Typically used by connections as requested by the underlying dbus library.

Author
Rick L Vinyard Jr rviny.nosp@m.ard@.nosp@m.cs.nm.nosp@m.su.e.nosp@m.du
